This directory contains support files used by various tests.

 * localhost.pem is an example CA-signed certificate bundle from the
   LetsEncrypt Pebble test server. See
   https://github.com/letsencrypt/pebble/tree/master/test/certs for further
   details.

 * gen_certs.sh and demo.conf are for generating self-signed certs.

 * demo.pem and demo-nosan.pem are self-signed certs generated by the above
   script.
